text: yunus jativaru tappa! Itara e puravasulaku kuda, (siksanu cusina taruvata) visvasincaga, vari visvasam variki labhadayakam kaleka poyindi! (Yunus jati) varu visvasincina pidapa memu vari nundi ihaloka jivitapu avamanakaramaina siksanu tolagincamu. Mariyu varini kontakalam varaku variki (ihaloka jivitanni) anubhavince avakasanni iccamu
